price: “Birakwiye ko ntacyo navuga kuri Allah kitari ukuri. Rwose mbazaniye ibitangaza bigaragara biturutse kwa Nyagasani wanyu. Bityo rekura bene Isiraheli tujyane.”
arabic: حَقِيقٌ عَلَىٰٓ أَن لَّآ أَقُولَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡحَقَّۚ قَدۡ جِئۡتُكُم بِبَيِّنَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ فَأَرۡسِلۡ مَعِيَ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: ḥaqīqun ʿalā an lā aqūla ʿalā al-lahi illā al-ḥaqa qad ji'tukum bibayyinatin min rabbikum fa-arsil maʿiya banī is'rāīla
